channel.title: Morning FID Briefing
channel.itunes:author: Julien
channel.itunes:summary: Daily macro and monetary policy insights from the Fed, BoE, and ECB impacting European bond markets.
channel.description: Daily macro and monetary policy insights from the Fed, BoE, and ECB impacting European bond markets.

item.title: Welcome to the Morning FID Briefing
item.description: Welcome message introducing the Morning FID Briefing podcast, providing daily insights on central bank policies and fixed income markets.
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the Morning FID Briefing, your daily snapshot of central bank insights and fixed income developments across G7 markets.
item.itunes:author: Julien
item.content:encoded: Welcome to the Morning FID Briefing — your daily snapshot of central bank insights and fixed income developments across G7 markets.

item.title: ECB Podcast — How the ECB steers inflation
item.description: Latest ECB Podcast episode on monetary policy and inflation outlook.
item.itunes:summary: ECB Podcast — latest episode explaining how the ECB steers inflation in the euro area.
item.itunes:author: European Central Bank
item.content:encoded: ECB Podcast — latest episode explaining how the ECB steers inflation in the euro area.

item.title: Bondcast — BoE and ECB outlook for rates
item.description: BNP Paribas Bondcast team discusses the latest ECB and BoE rate expectations.

item.itunes:author: BNP Paribas
